pr_title: feat: new sample - Tables: Copy multiple tables

timeline.message:
feat: new sample - Tables: Copy multiple tables

b/147141782
update test to create new destination table for each test since existing table cannot be overwritten and would throw bigquery error
add env vars for sample test builds

timeline.bodyText:
note the eight space indent here. This is inconsistent with google style that specifies four spaces for a continuation line. It's the same thing I saw this morning in a different PR and filed #72 about.
I wonder if we need to update our version of something related to formatting?
timeline.author: elharo

replies.bodyText: Yes - I raised a ticket with the team responsible for the tool (coveo). We do have the latest version (2.9). I will keep you posted.
replies.author: stephaniewang526
